name: Wolfenstein 3D TC
storyline: The Wolfenstein 3D Total Conversion for Doom is designed to be just that... A total conversion of Wolfenstein 3D to the Doom engine. My aim has been to recreate the look and feel of Wolfenstein 3D in a more modern 2.5D engine, while still preserving the original gameplay, weapons, enemies, etc.
summary: Wolfenstein 3D Total Conversion for Doom is a total conversion of Wolfenstein 3D to the Doom engine. The main objective of the project was to recreate Wolfenstein 3D in a more modern 2.5D engine, while still preserving the original gameplay, weapons, enemies, etc.
